TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Pailasan, title = Pailasan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pailasan} }

S.FORM: alang Pailasan ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Kano go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 31 buwan, 89 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 83% kyan ku 74 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 17% kyan ku 15 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 73%, binah lihuyan s'uli 10%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyahu' na Pailasan hya' ga Efong. tay 'zil na Pailasan hya' ga Pakala'ac. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Pailasan ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Pailasan ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Pailasan ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Kano go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 31 bowan, 89 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 83% kyan ko 74 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 17% kyan ko 15 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 73%, binah lihoyan s'oli 10%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyaho' na Pailasan hya' ga Efong. tay 'zil na Pailasan hya' ga Pakala'ac. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Pailasan ga ongat kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Pailasan ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
